meta.title: Parisian Literary Salon
meta.description: Smoky intellectual atmosphere of Left Bank cafes. Existentialist chic meets romantic melancholy. Sartre and de Beauvoir debating love over espresso and Gauloises.

influences.influence: Les Deux Magots, Cafe de Flore

typography.principle: French elegance with intellectual weight. Serif fonts with personality - not cold, but warm and slightly worn like a well-loved book.

font.name: Bodoni Moda
font.note: High contrast Didone style - quintessentially French

font.name: Lora
font.note: Contemporary serif with calligraphic roots, excellent readability

font.name: Caveat
font.note: Natural handwriting feel - like marginalia in a borrowed book

avoid.reason: Sans-serif feels too corporate; novelty scripts feel cheap

color.principle: Warm, lived-in, slightly yellowed like cafe walls stained by decades of cigarette smoke and conversation. Deep romantic accents.

color.name: espresso
color.description: Deep coffee brown-black for primary text

color.name: creme
color.description: Warm cream - like aged paper or cafe au lait foam

color.name: parchment
color.description: Slightly darker cream for layered surfaces

color.name: bordeaux
color.description: Deep wine red - for love, passion, critical moments

motion.principle: Slow, contemplative, like cigarette smoke curling upward. Nothing rushed - this is a place for long conversations.

animation.name: smoke-fade
animation.description: Content fades in softly, like emerging from a haze
animation.keyframes: from { opacity: 0; filter: blur(2px); } to { opacity: 1; filter: blur(0); }

animation.name: handwrite-in
animation.description: Text appears as if being written by hand

animation.name: page-turn
animation.description: Subtle rotation suggesting a turning page
animation.keyframes: from { opacity: 0; transform: rotateY(-5deg) translateX(-10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: rotateY(0) translateX(0); }

pattern.name: conversation-reveal
pattern.description: Elements appear like exchanges in a conversation - unhurried

avoid.effect: Anything that feels rushed or corporate

backgrounds.principle: Textured, warm, atmospheric. Suggest the patina of age and the warmth of candlelight.

treatment.name: cafe-wall
treatment.css: background: var(--creme); background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 100 100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noise'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.8' numOctaves='4' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noise)' opacity='0.03'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
treatment.description: Subtle noise texture like aged plaster walls

treatment.name: candlelit
treatment.description: Warm glow from above like candlelight

components.principle: Elegant but not precious. Everything should feel like it's been used and loved - rounded corners, soft shadows, organic shapes.

style.name: cafe-card
primary
ghost
ornamental
style.description: Faded rule that trails off at edges

style.name: astrological

layout.principle: Intimate, not cramped. Like a small cafe table with just enough room for two cups and a conversation.

iconography.principle: Delicate line illustrations with a hand-drawn quality. Think Parisian fashion sketches or cafe scene drawings.
